thread.title: Police to use aerial drones
thread.title_full: Police to use aerial drones | Border - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Police to use aerial drones
text:
Cumbria Police are to use drones Credit: ITV Border Cumbria Police have a new weapon in their fight against crime.
Officers are now able to deploy two remote-controlled aerial drones to help collect evidence and carry out surveillance.
The Force says drones have proved highly effective when used by police in other parts of the country.
Last updated Tue 1 Sep 2015 Read more 2 updates Police drones taking off in Cumbria Technology Cumbria Police Cumbria Drones
